org.projectspinoza.twitterswissarmyknife

Class TwitterSwissArmyKnife

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.projectspinoza.twitterswissarmyknife.TwitterSwissArmyKnife

  • public class TwitterSwissArmyKnife
extends java.lang.Object
    TwitterSwissArmyKnife A simple command line utility that allows a user to interact with Twitter's public API. it is very simple, straight forward, easy to use and flexible API. It provides Method chaining, re-usability, flexibility and simplicity.
    Version:
    v1.0.0
    Author:
    org.projectspinoza
